episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0136_00_: Hmm...

Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Just as I
thought—your Poryphone had just what I wanted:

plenty of battle records with
Mega-Evolved Pokémon.

Hm? You want to know what I’m studying
right now?

I suppose you’d say it’s...the influence that
Mega Evolution has on Pokémon, perhaps?

Based on previous research, it’s actually been
reported that Mega Evolution has negative effects
on Pokémon.

So I’ve been wondering why Pokémon change this
way at all.

Is Mega Evolution a type of Evolution that Pokémon
really don’t want for themselves? Or is there some
reason they do want it?

What would you think if you had such a
power, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I’d push myself, out of love.

So you think they’re doing it for their Trainers, with
whom they have such deep bonds of friendship?
What a passionate perspective!
I’d do whatever it took to help.
Yes, that’s what I was thinking, too.

I think Pokémon may push themselves too far
sometimes, trying to get even stronger so that they
can help their Trainers.

So I feel my role now is to find a way to
lessen the burden that Mega Evolution puts
on Pokémon.

Thanks so much for giving me your honest
opinion, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I suppose I may have been overthinking it.

I’d like to thank you... Do you have some time
later, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

You’re always helping me out with your extensive
Pokémon battle data and your creative ideas.
I do hope you’ll allow me to return the favor!

Professor Sycamore treated
[Name:PlayerNickname ] to some of his
favorite coffee.

I’ve visited cafés all over Kalos, but this coffee
is my favorite yet. What do you think?
I like it!
I’m so glad you approve!
I really love the deep and bitter taste.
It’s not for me.

Haha, no need to force yourself to drink it, then!
Instead...
Here! Follow that up with a sweet treat!
Everyone has different tastes in coffee.

But sometimes tastes change with age, and not
just about coffee.

In a few years, we may have very different
opinions about the things we like the most now.

So I think it’s a good idea to try out a lot of
flavors in life for the sake of your own future self.

I hope you continue to change and evolve as
well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Whether it be through your travels, adventures,
or café hopping, like me...

Go out and experience the sweet, sour, bitter, and
all other flavors in life so you can choose what
works best for you.
And then you’ll become a truly discerning adult!
